item.title: 堪萨斯州试图吸引 NFL 酋长穿越密苏里州界线
item.description: 堪萨斯州的高层立法者正在为 NFL 堪萨斯城酋长队跨过州界，将他们的主场从密苏里州搬到邻州而努力。【原文：Top Kansas lawmakers are making a play for the NFL’s Kansas City Chiefs to cross state lines and move their home from Missouri to the neighboring state instead.】

item.title: ADP 就业报告疲软后，债券收益率维持在两个月低点附近
item.description: 十年期国债收益率维持在四月初以来的最低水平附近，此前一份私人就业报告显示，在周五政府公布薪资数据之前，劳动力市场出现了更多放缓迹象。【原文：Ten-year Treasury yields held near their lowest level since early April after a private jobs report showed more signs of slowing in the labor market ahead of government payroll data on Friday.】

item.title: 斯特恩利希特称收紧喜达屋房地产投资信托赎回限制 "很艰难
item.description: 亿万富翁巴里-斯特恩利希特（Barry Sternlicht）表示，进一步限制从喜达屋房地产收益信托基金（Starwood Real Estate Income Trust）提取资金是一个 "非常艰难的决定"。【原文：Billionaire Barry Sternlicht said it was “a very tough decision” to further limit withdrawals from Starwood Real Estate Income Trust, the $10 billion fund that found itself stuck between investors’ desire to redeem shares and a distaste for selling at a discount.】

item.title: 美国法院驳回证交会对冲基金费用披露规定
item.description: 联邦上诉法院驳回了美国证券交易委员会要求对冲基金和私募股权公司向投资者详细说明季度费用和开支的规定，这对监管机构来说是一个重大挫折。【原文：A federal appeals court struck down the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s rules requiring hedge funds and private equity firms to detail quarterly fees and expenses to investors, a significant setback for the regulator.】

item.title: 拉扎德选择 Evercore 的 Taetle 进行消费和零售交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. is hiring Adam Taetle to lead its global consumer, retail and leisure business, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划暂停征收食品进口税以缓解通货膨胀
item.description: 尼日利亚正在考虑暂停对主食、药品和其他必需品征收六个月的进口税，以减缓这个非洲人口最多国家的通货膨胀。【原文：Nigeria is considering suspending import duties on staple food, drugs and other essential items for six months to slow inflation in Africa’s most-populous nation.】

item.title: 德国财政部长承诺减税 250 亿美元
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）宣布，计划在2026年前减免230亿欧元（约合250亿美元）的家庭所得税，尽管他还在与联盟伙伴就如何填补明年的预算缺口进行争论。【原文：German Finance Minister Christian Lindner announced plans for €23 billion ($25 billion) in income-tax relief for households through 2026 even as he wrestles with his coalition partners over how to plug a hole in next year’s budget.】

item.title: 北海油田 "嗡嗡 "仍在关闭，有助于缓解供应过剩问题
item.description: 北海四十年代原油的最大供油田巴扎德（Buzzard）的意外停产令许多交易商措手不及，这可能有助于缓解原油过剩。【原文：The unplanned shutdown in Buzzard, the biggest feeding oil field for North Sea Forties crude, has caught many traders by surprise and is likely to help ease a surplus.】

item.title: 地中海地区野火风险达到极端水平
item.description: 在希腊和西班牙，野火的威胁已经达到了极点，风险也蔓延到了法国里维埃拉地区。【原文：The threat of wildfires is reaching extreme levels in Greece and Spain, with risks also spreading to the French Riviera.】

item.title: 超级富豪正投入资金押注旧金山卷土重来
item.description: Goodwin Gaw 以 8,200 万美元的价格买下了旧金山一处被取消赎回权的办公大楼，该大楼原为 Blackstone 公司所有，他确信人们一定认为他是个 "白痴"。【原文：Goodwin Gaw is convinced people must think he’s “an idiot” after he bought a foreclosed San Francisco office complex formerly owned by Blackstone Inc. for $82 million.】

item.title: ATB 增设债券交易台，填补汇丰收购后留下的空白
item.description: ATB 资本市场公司（ATB Capital Markets）将在多伦多设立一个新的固定收益交易柜台，这家阿尔伯塔省政府所有的贷款机构试图填补加拿大金融市场整合留下的空缺。【原文：ATB Capital Markets is starting a new fixed-income trading desk based in Toronto, as the Alberta government-owned lender seeks to fill a hole left by consolidation in Canadian financial markets.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡与双边贷款人的债务重组接近尾声
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，斯里兰卡和一组债权人正在就一项旨在重组该国与双边贷款人之间债务的协议进行深入谈判。【原文：Sri Lanka and a group of creditors are in advanced talks over a deal aimed at restructuring the nation’s debt with bilateral lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特阿美巨型石油公司发售成为本年度沙特最大首次公开募股的亮点
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司 120 亿美元的二次股票出售，为该王国本年度最大的首次公开募股抹去了光彩。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s $12 billion secondary share sale took the shine off the kingdom’s biggest initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 适应制裁，俄罗斯五月石油收入增长 50
item.description: 随着原油价格的上涨和国家对国际制裁的适应，5 月份俄罗斯国家预算的石油收入比一年前增长了近 50%。【原文：Russia’s oil proceeds to the state budget increased almost 50% in May from a year ago, as its crude prices rose and the nation adapted to international sanctions.】

item.title: 芬兰希望欧盟提供溢油船应对影子舰队风险
item.description: 由于俄罗斯原油运输对波罗的海北部地区构成的威胁日益严重，芬兰呼吁欧盟采购一艘船只，随时准备应对该地区的石油泄漏事件。【原文：Finland called for the European Union to procure a vessel to be on standby for oil spills in the northern parts of the Baltic Sea, as Russian crude transports are posing a growing threat in the region.】

item.title: 交易商急于交易铜矿，而矿商正在套现
item.description: 一些最大的大宗商品贸易商对铜的激烈争夺，为矿商创造了谈判有利条件的机会，从巨额预付款到超长合同，不一而足。【原文：A heated competition for copper among some of the biggest commodity traders is creating opportunities for miners to negotiate favorable terms ranging from huge upfront payments to extra-long contracts.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司以 4.5 亿英镑收购英国燃气发电厂

item.title: 私募股权投资公司的最新套现举措：以所持股票抵押借款
item.description: 去年，Cinven 的客户得到了一个不受欢迎的消息：这家收购公司与一家实验室检测公司的融资进展并不顺利。客户非但没有得到意外之财，反而不得不投入更多现金。【原文：Cinven’s clients got some unwelcome news last year: the buyout firm’s financing tied to a lab-testing company wasn’t going well. Instead of getting a windfall, clients had to ante up more cash.】

item.title: 纳税人出资 38,280 美元的医疗保健服务助推纽约市就业热潮
item.description: 纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯喜欢吹嘘说，自他 2022 年 1 月上任以来，纽约市已经恢复了在大流行病期间失去的全部 30 万个工作岗位。当地官员指出，在过去一年中，纽约市及其郊区增加的工作岗位总数超过了美国任何其他城市地区。【原文：New York Mayor Eric Adams likes to boast that since he took office in January 2022, the city has regained all of the 300,000 jobs it lost during the pandemic. item.title: 上半年资产支持债务销售额达 1750 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 2024 年迄今为止，美国和欧洲已售出价值约 1750 亿美元的由抵押贷款等资产支持的债务，这将是该行业至少六年来最繁忙的半年发行。【原文：Some $175 billion worth of debt backed by assets such as mortgages has been sold in the US and Europe so far in 2024, in what is shaping up to be the busiest half of issuance for the sector in at least six years.】

item.title: 美国购房申请量创 4 月初以来最大降幅
